Articles.Content:
The new cockpit in 0.90 looks so much like some of the b9 cockpits.

did the same person model it?
No, but as one of B9 dev said, porkjet, the one behind the stock mk3, wanted the new part to have the same size (and shape) as the b9 HL part. No wander the new cockpit looke like the b9 hl one.
I think it looks too much of that of a real space shuttle.
